title: kadir Eghum matiyAghum pozhudAyinum
sahitya:
kadir Eghum matiyAghum pozhudAyinum innum indak-kaNNan varak-kANEnE nAn sheyyum vaghai tONEnE


anupallavi

  munnam oru taram ippaDiyAccu muzhuvadum ivaruDan tOtakamAip-pOccu


caraNam 1    varum vazhiyilE evaL vizhiyil shokkinArO vambu perutta evaL valaiyil shikkinArO 
tirumba manaminri tayangit-tavittArO dEvAdi dEvan en vinai tIrArO vArArO
    caraNam 2    vAngi vaitta malar mAlaiyum vADudE maraittu vaitta veNNai I moittup-pOghudE
Engi varum vazhiyai iru kaNNum nOkkudE eNNAda eNNamellAm eNNip-puNNAghudE
